ModMetaData.name: Royalty compatible with Expand Furniture Patch
ModMetaData.author: HawnHan
ModMetaData.description: Supported: - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Core - Vanilla Furniyure Expanded - Spacer(Dependence on Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Core) - Gloomy Furniture - RIMkea - Mechalit Core 1.1 - More Furniture 1.1 Compatible with Unlock Working Emperor and Royalty Tweaks Vanilli furnitures still effective.But enjoy life always is a good thing.So I ignore limit the bed. This patch work whatever you used all or just one of them. I didn't change game setting,just share more ways to you. Check Steam for detail since I don't want to update yet another list here. 支持： - 原版家具拓展 - 核心 - 原版家具拓展 - 太空组件(需求原版家具拓展 - 核心作为前置) - 复古家具 - 边缘宜家 - 机械核心(未有汉化，该名字是我自译) - 更多家具1.1 兼容Unlock Working Emperor和Royalty Tweaks 该补丁无论是你同时使用所有支持的Mod或是只是用其中一个，都可以正常工作。 我没有修改原有的游戏设定，这个Mod只是给你更多选择。 享受生活总是没错的，因此我没有限制，同时原版家具也可以正常的生效。 请查看Mod页面以获取更详细的说明，我懒得同时更新两个地方的内容。
